/* Control Program */ /* ACT generated Mon Mar 5 10:30:48 2018 */
CATEGORY Stroke CATEGORY StrokeInheritance
InstructionsOn @8..2047
DropOutCtrlOff @144
CvtCutIn = 1, 0@144 /* 1 pixel cut-in for over- and undershoots */
ClearTypeCtrl = 1
LinearAdvanceWidths = 0
/***** Height CVTs *****/ UpperCase Grey Y SquareHeight 2: 698 /* cap height */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 2, 89") 8: 0 /* base line */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 8, 89") RoundHeight 3: 12 ~ 2 @ 42 /* cap height overshoot */ 9: -12 ~ 8 @ 42 /* base line undershoot */
LowerCase SquareHeight 0: 740 /* lc ascender */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 0, 89") 6: 516 /* x height */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 6, 89") 10: 0 /* base line */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 10, 89") 14: -200 /* lc descender */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 14, 89") RoundHeight 1: 740 /* lc ascender overshoot */ 7: 12 ~ 6 @ 42 /* x height overshoot */ 11: -12 ~ 10 @ 42 /* base line undershoot */ 15: -12 ~ 14 @ 42 /* lc descender undershoot */
Figure SquareHeight 4: 698 /* figure height */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 4, 89") 12: 0 /* base line */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 12, 89") RoundHeight 5: 12 ~ 4 @ 42 /* figure height overshoot */ 13: -12 ~ 12 @ 42 /* base line undershoot */
Other SquareHeight 16: 698 /* other height */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 16, 89") 18: 0 /* base line */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 18, 89") RoundHeight 17: 12 ~ 16 @ 42 /* other height overshoot */ 19: -12 ~ 18 @ 42 /* base line undershoot */
Other /* SUPERIORS ZONES */ SquareHeight 151: 698 /* superior top */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 151, 89") 153: 323 /* superior bottom */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 153, 89") RoundHeight 152: 6 ~ 151 @ 42 /* superior overshoot */ 154: -6 ~ 153 @ 42 /* superior undershoot */
Other /* INFERIORS ZONES (also used by ordinals) */ SquareHeight 155: 369 /* inferior top */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 155, 89") 157: 0 /* inferior bottom */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 157, 89") RoundHeight 156: 6 ~ 155 @ 42 /* inferior overshoot */ 158: -6 ~ 157 @ 42 /* inferior undershoot */
/***** Reserved CVTs *****/ AnyGroup AnyColor AnyDirection AnyCategory 20: 0 /* DO NOT USE!!! */
/***** Italic rise and run CVTs *****/ UpperCase Grey Y ItalicRise 21: 698
X ItalicRun 22: 140
LowerCase Grey Y ItalicRise 23: 516
X ItalicRun 24: 103
Figure Grey Y ItalicRise 25: 698
X ItalicRun 26: 140
Other Grey Y ItalicRise 27: 698
X ItalicRun 28: 140
/***** Grand-Parent CVT *****/ AnyGroup Black X StrokeInheritance 29: 77 /* 112x */
/***** Parent CVTs *****/ UpperCase Black X StrokeInheritance 30: 79 /* 54x */ LowerCase Black X StrokeInheritance 33: 76 /* 58x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 29, 33, 61, 30, 171, 90")
UpperCase Black Y StrokeInheritance 31: 72 /* 25x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 31, 58, 30, 72, 91") LowerCase Black Y StrokeInheritance 34: 68 /* 21x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 34, 57, 33, 59, 91")
UpperCase Black Diag StrokeInheritance 32: 72 /* 25x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 32, 58, 30, 72, 91") LowerCase Black Diag StrokeInheritance 35: 68 /* 21x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 35, 57, 33, 59, 91")
/***** StrokeInheritance CVTs *****/ UpperCase Black X StrokeInheritance 36: 67 = 30 @ 42 /* 1x */ 37: 79 = 30 @255 /* 68x */ 38: 90 = 37 @ 46 /* 5x */ Y StrokeInheritance 39: 72 = 31 @255 /* 36x */ Diag StrokeInheritance 40: 72 = 32 @255 /* 20x */ 41: 66 = 40 @ 84 /* 6x */ 42: 78 /* 17x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 42, 54, 32, 30, 92")
LowerCase Black X StrokeInheritance 43: 76 = 33 @255 /* 72x */ 44: 85 = 33 @ 56 /* 7x */ Y StrokeInheritance 45: 69 /* 47x */ ASM("SVTCA[Y]") ASM("CALL[], 45, 8, 34, 33, 92") 46: 103 = 34 @ 15 /* 2x */ Diag StrokeInheritance 47: 65 = 35 @167 /* 21x */ 48: 61 = 47 @125 /* 10x */ 49: 75 /* 9x */ ASM("SVTCA[X]") ASM("CALL[], 49, 56, 35, 33, 92")
Figure Black X StrokeInheritance 50: 81 /* 28x */ 51: 91 = 50 @ 50 /* 5x */ Y StrokeInheritance 52: 72 /* 20x */ Diag StrokeInheritance 53: 67 /* 8x */
Other Black X StrokeInheritance 54: 69 /* 50x */ 55: 74 = 54 @ 84 /* 9x */ 56: 77 = 54 @ 56 /* 4x */ 57: 83 = 54 @ 34 /* 2x */ 58: 245 /* 2x */ Y StrokeInheritance 59: 63 /* 30x */ 60: 65 = 59 @250 /* 25x */ 61: 61 = 60 @125 /* 9x */ 62: 129 /* 6x */ Diag StrokeInheritance 63: 36 /* 1x */ 64: 66 /* 35x */ 65: 53 = 64 @ 39 /* 5x */ 66: 64 = 64 @250 /* 30x */ 67: 71 = 66 @ 72 /* 10x */

LowerCase Black X Stroke 86: 70 = 43 @ 84 /* 1x */ 87: 76 = 43 @255 /* 49x */ 88: 79 = 43 @167 /* 22x */ 89: 85 = 44 @255 /* 6x */ 90: 87 = 44 @250 /* 1x */ Y Stroke 91: 62 = 45 @ 72 /* 3x */ 92: 69 = 45 @255 /* 42x */ 93: 73 = 45 @125 /* 1x */ 94: 79 = 45 @ 50 /* 1x */ 95: 103 = 46 @255 /* 2x */ Diag Stroke 96: 55 = 48 @ 84 /* 1x */ 97: 61 = 48 @255 /* 9x */ 98: 66 = 47 @255 /* 6x */ 99: 68 = 47 @250 /* 5x */ 100: 72 = 49 @167 /* 2x */ 101: 75 = 49 @255 /* 7x */
Figure Black X Stroke 102: 68 = 50 @ 39 /* 2x */ 103: 73 = 50 @ 56 /* 2x */ 104: 78 = 50 @125 /* 7x */ 105: 81 = 50 @250 /* 4x */ 106: 83 = 50 @255 /* 8x */ 107: 87 = 51 @125 /* 1x */ 108: 91 = 51 @255 /* 4x */ Y Stroke 109: 68 = 52 @125 /* 2x */ 110: 71 = 52 @255 /* 18x */ Diag Stroke 111: 64 = 53 @167 /* 1x */ 112: 67 = 53 @255 /* 4x */ 113: 70 = 53 @167 /* 1x */ 114: 74 = 53 @ 72 /* 2x */
Other Black X Stroke 115: 38 = 54 @ 17 /* 1x */ 116: 56 = 54 @ 42 /* 1x */ 117: 68 = 54 @255 /* 25x */ 118: 70 = 54 @250 /* 8x */ 119: 72 = 55 @250 /* 3x */ 120: 74 = 55 @255 /* 6x */ 121: 77 = 56 @255 /* 3x */ 122: 79 = 56 @250 /* 1x */ 123: 83 = 57 @255 /* 2x */ 124: 245 = 58 @255 /* 2x */ Y Stroke 125: 50 = 59 @ 39 /* 4x */ 126: 59 = 61 @250 /* 4x */ 127: 61 = 61 @255 /* 5x */ 128: 63 = 60 @250 /* 6x */ 129: 66 = 60 @255 /* 7x */ 130: 68 = 60 @250 /* 2x */ 131: 72 = 60 @ 72 /* 1x */ 132: 82 = 59 @ 27 /* 1x */ 133: 129 = 62 @255 /* 6x */ Diag Stroke 134: 36 = 63 @255 /* 1x */ 135: 49 = 65 @125 /* 2x */ 136: 52 = 65 @250 /* 1x */ 137: 54 = 65 @255 /* 2x */ 138: 60 = 66 @125 /* 3x */ 139: 64 = 66 @255 /* 9x */ 140: 67 = 66 @167 /* 8x */ 141: 71 = 67 @255 /* 8x */ 142: 75 = 67 @125 /* 2x */
